root.name: Buccaneer: The Pursuit of Infamy
root.description: GameplayIn this came you are a pirate sailing the Caribbean seas. The goal is to become the most feared pirate by roaming and pirating the seas and keeping your crew under control.The game consists of more than 50 missions and you are able to upgrade your ship several times. The gameplay takes an arcade-like approach.PC System RequirementsMinimum:Operating system: Windows XP VistaProcessor: 1.6 GHz ProcessorMemory: 512 MB RAMHard disk space: 500 MB of Available Hard Disk SpaceVideo: DirectX Compatible 256 MB Video Card (must support Pixel Shader 2.0)Sound: DirectX compliant sound cardDirectX®: DirectX 9.0cRecommended:Operating system: Windows XP VistaProcessor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core ProcessorMemory: 1 GB RAMHard disk space: 1 GB of Available Hard Disk SpaceVideo: DirectX DirectX Compatible 512 MB Video Card (must support Pixel Shader 3.0)Sound: DirectX compliant sound cardDirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
